name: Micheal Cindrich
description: Hi actually am new here looking for a soulmate…..I’m intelligent, confident and assertive man and I have a great sense of humor. I love to laugh and make people feel comfortable around me. I am focused and driven and usually succeed in most everything I do. I like to be challenged and enjoy mental stimulation and conversations on many subjects and I am always open to learning new things or ideas. I am always up for taking cruises and traveling to explore new places or taking a day or weekend trip . Chemistry, communication, compatibility and passion are very important to me and I think are keys to any successful relationship. I seek connections on all levels including intellectual, physical, and emotional levels. I’m looking for a sincere and passionate educator looking for a soul mate, who is not afraid to juggle his strengths as well as the ability to show his sensitive and affectionate side. Also must be in the category of “game over.” Seeking a relationship that will possibly stand the test of time.Quote-“Just because you are a Character, doesn’t mean you have Character”….. I joined this site basically out of curiosity; to see if anyone could spark my fancy/interest.
